fix: Resolve TypeScript error in reminders page by transforming Supabase query result

Fixed type mismatch where Supabase foreign key query was returning user as an array instead of a single object. Added transformation to ensure familyMembers data matches the expected FamilyMember type. Also includes share functionality for reminder cards.

fix: Persist notification dismissals using upsert instead of update

Changed notification dismissal to use upsert to ensure dismissals are saved even when user_preferences record doesn''t exist yet. This fixes the issue where the welcome message would reappear on every dashboard visit.
